named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getPopularTagsByWebsite&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1 AND w.lastUsed >= ?2

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getPopularTagsByWebsite
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getPopularTagsByWebsiteNull&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL AND w.lastUsed >= ?2

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getPopularTagsByWebsiteNull
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsite&NameStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1 AND w.name LIKE ?2

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsite
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsiteNull&NameStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL AND w.name LIKE ?2

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsiteNull
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsite&NameStartsWithOrderByName
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1 AND w.name LIKE ?2 ORDER BY w.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsiteOrderByName
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website = ?1 ORDER BY w.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsiteNull&NameStartsWithOrderByName
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL AND w.name LIKE ?2 ORDER BY w.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.getTagsByWebsiteNullOrderByName
named-query.query: SELECT w.name, SUM(w.total) FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.website IS NULL ORDER BY w.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryTagAggregateData.removeByTotalLessEqual
named-query.query: DELETE FROM WeblogEntryTagAggregateData w WHERE w.total <= ?1
